data.author: Richard Johnson

changelog.release_notes: Added "Menu Icon" and support for Diorite (Pebble 2).
Updated to handle display obstructed by advance notification windows at the bottom.  Fixed a bug in display of month, date, hour, minute in corners.

Updated for new Pebble Time 2 screen size, where it looks really great!  Unfortunately, there's currently a bug in the Pebble black & white platforms (original Pebble and Pebble 2), such that the earth and moon image doesn't rotate correctly.  I'm hoping that the Pebble Store software will automatically select the older version for those platforms.  I'll release an updated watch face for those when the bug is fixed.

I'm being told there are some problems with this watchface when running under the latest OS.  I'm not seeing any problems on my own Pebble Time watch, but just in case there are some toolkit incompatibilities, I'm rebuilding the entire thing with the latest toolkit version.

Increased the width of the battery indicator for Pebble Round watches.  I finally saw this running on a real Pebble Round watch and realized that I couldn't see the battery indicator at all.  If it's now too big, please let me know.
Fixed the location of the bluetooth symbol such that if the bluetooth connection is lost, it displays in the middle of the sun, which works much better for both rectangular and round screens.

Added an asteroid which travels around the sun once per week, starting with Sunday at the top.  This means that the first half of the week is on the right side and the second half is on the left.  You can turn it on and off from the configuration menu.
Keeping up with the latest SDK, 3.2.
Moved to using latest SDK 3.1.  Moved bluetooth indicator to top left, where it doesn't interfere with the sun's ray lines.

Updated to use SDK 3.0 beta 11 with colors!
Numbers can be hidden using configuration.
Numbers brought up for 1 minute with wrist snap.
Moon is a little larger for better visibility.
Added automatic display of date and time with a flick of the wrist.  This means people who like the clean simple display without numbers can still bring up the date on demand, whenever needed.
Fixed a minor problem with options.

This version makes the digit fields in the corners completely configurable, including the bluetooth connection/disconnnection notifications.  It also does more cleaning up of the memory used by the application upon exit.

data.description: I'm calling it "Orbits". The idea is that the planet orbits the sun every 12 hours and the little moon orbits the planet every 60 minutes. So, for example, the pictures here show the face displaying the times of approximately 4:58pm and the one with the numbers is displaying 4:53pm (actually shown at the bottom as "16:53").  If you configure it to not display the numbers, then you can get the numbers to display by simply a wrist snap.  The battery life is displayed via a simple line along the bottom.  The watch face also monitors the bluetooth connection and will buzz and display a bluetooth symbol if the connection is lost.  Numbers and bluetooth monitoring is configurable.

latest_release.release_notes: Added "Menu Icon" and support for Diorite (Pebble 2).

data.title: Orbits

data.description:
I just wanted to see BIG NUMBERS in my watch face so I would not have to squint to tell the time.

Both 12- and 24-hour formats are supported, and battery time is optimized since the screen is only updated once every minute.

Customizable settings include colors, vibrations, connection, battery indicator.

data.author: Kammy
data.description: Displays a game of ping-pong between two AI opponents. The score is shown at the top of the screen. Although they play 24/7, the AI players are quite good. So good in fact, that the player on the right only misses 24 times a day. The player on the left is not quite as good and misses 60 times an hour. As a result, the current score of their game is also the current time of day! Coincidence?
data.title: Ping Pong

Noach de Haas had an idea - a different clock image for every minute of the day.  He has spent over four years on four different continents gathering 720 photos.  Klokken displays a beautiful clock image every minute on your Pebble.

Custom settings include date format, battery and connectivity indicators, hourly vibration.

data.description:
Based on the classy, minimalistic watches designed by Aark Collective. Before I bought a Pebble, I wore one - and I've missed it ever since!

Now includes date - if you prefer no date, search "AARK".

Check out their beautiful watches here: aarkcollective.com/products

Not endorsed by Aark - it's just a tribute!

data.author: Astro Apps

changelog.release_notes:
This release fixes a problem that caused a memory leak in version 1.1.0. So if you used version 1.1.0 please make a factory reset of your Pebble before installing the new version of my watchface to solve the issue. Sorry for that!

Also I changed the procedure to get the location. Now my watchface should be able to get the position when it is known only by GPS. Feedback is welcome, if this works fine.


Android users can use the new version immediately, iOS users have to wait for the next update of the Pebble App Store.

data.description: SunTime Pro is an ideal watchface not only for travellers and photographers. It shows sunrise and sunset times as well as the current elevation of the sun and a graphical representation for day, night and twilight for the actual location. Furthermore it displays the local time and the time in a second timezone (e.g. at home), date and weekday in several languages, bluetooth and battery status.

latest_release.release_notes:
This release fixes a problem that caused a memory leak in version 1.1.0. So if you used version 1.1.0 please make a factory reset of your Pebble before installing the new version of my watchface to solve the issue. Sorry for that!

Also I changed the procedure to get the location. Now my watchface should be able to get the position when it is known only by GPS. Feedback is welcome, if this works fine.


Android users can use the new version immediately, iOS users have to wait for the next update of the Pebble App Store.

data.title: SunTime Pro

data.author: Jnm

changelog.release_notes: Added option to bypass splash animation.
3.14: Pi version ! Support for Pebble Time Round.
Added Ice Blue theme and mirror mode
Added inverted mode for B&W Pebbles
Changed BT Disconnect vibration pattern (thanks to Danielle Church)
Config screen is now fully JS (no more PHP) -> Preparation for phone side caching
Added workaround for Pebble.getActiveWatchInfo() failure on Android devices.
Fixed Color Capability detection in JS
Fixed a background color problem and added dynamic color changes to custom theme in configuration screen
Fixed crash when leaving watchface during starting animation
Defaults to a color theme when installed on a Pebble Time
Added Pebble Time support with color themes
Added options to disable battery display on tap and BT status

- Smoothed Round corners animations (goes to "flat" corner at anim middle, then to target corner)
- Automatic round corners calculations (this means for letters too!)

data.description:
Now available for Pebble Time!
Choose your very own color theme and share it with your friends!

Simple and eye catching display with some kind of twist when digits change! Display is configurable from the Pebble Phone App, where you can choose the date format (dd/mm/yy or mm/dd/yy) and if you prefer, the day of week in Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Russian or Spanish. By user request, you can now choose if you prefer striped or plain digits, and thanks to Ron rounded digit corners!

Configurable : you can choose black or white, if you want to display the battery life...
And squares are now Animated !

This watchface was inspired by the E8 watch from Lexon, originally designed by Brieuc du Roscoät.
From left to right, columns are ten of the hours, one of the hours, ten of the minutes, one of the minutes.

On the example, it is 8:21, 11:03
Feedback is welcome.

data.author: Simple K Productions
data.description:
Another variant of Simplicity, derived from Foxel's Simple F.  Supports both 12 and 24-hour mode, as well as display of battery and connection indicators. Indicators are shown in error conditions or after a shake.

To change 12/24-hour or background mode, shake the watch in the first 5 seconds after start-up. Each shake rotates through one of the four mode combinations.

data.author: U1PNS

changelog.release_notes:
-Second release, migrated from older sdk (1.0 on this sdk)
-Updates minutes hand every 2 min during the day, every 4 min during the night, to save batt
-Special mode when battery is below 15%, divides by 2 the refresh rate

data.description:
Make pebble batt to last a week or more.
Pebble display consumes a lot of power when its updated. Tipical watchface makes between 1.140 to 84.600 screen updates x day. 
This whatface updates the screen only 600 times x day!
If battery duration is critical for you, this is your watchface!

latest_release.release_notes:
-Second release, migrated from older sdk (1.0 on this sdk)
-Updates minutes hand every 2 min during the day, every 4 min during the night, to save batt
-Special mode when battery is below 15%, divides by 2 the refresh rate

data.title: LongLife Battery

data.author: Chris Lewis

changelog.release_notes:
v3.6:
- Use Clay for dynamic configuration.

3.5:
- Recompile with 3.8 to hopefully fix Aplite crash

v3.4:
- Fix bug with config page delivery

v3.3:
- Fix issues with new Sleep feature.

v3.2: 
- Fix Aplite and Basalt date alignment 
- Fix stuck animations sometimes 
- Add 'sleep' feature to save power overnight

v3.0:
- Complete re-write.
- Compatible with all 3 platforms
- Remove battery meter.

2.6:
- New config page with free color choice for Basalt wearers.
- New 'hide leading zero' option.
- New 'BT disconnected' icon.

2.4:
- Updated for Pebble Time
- Added color themes.
- Improved config page.

v2.3:
- All variants now rolled into one! Choose your features from the 'Settings' screen.
Animation issue looks to be fixed now. Fixes to other Editions coming soon.

data.description:
Note: All variant features are now rolled into this version! Choose from 'Settings'.

A minimal watch face with small, compact animations that show 15, 30 and 45 seconds past the minute.

On the minute change, the digits to be 'beamed up' are predicted, then animated, making for exciting midnights! Also fun: 09:59 and 19:59. Enjoy!

Now also includes colors on Pebble Time.

latest_release.release_notes:
v3.6:
- Use Clay for dynamic configuration.

data.title: Beam Up

data.description:
The Pebble's first playable watch face! 

Dragon's Lair: Ropes is an endless swinging game. Flick to start a game and swing to the next rope.  How far can you swing?

• Demo play on launch / 15 minutes
• Minute logo roll
• Persistent top score
• Increasing difficulty

Don't let the simplicity fool you, you'll be glued after 20 ropes!

example picture: 13:02 + date + 50% battery

Displays your next appointment*
Shake your wrist to check:
- day, weekday and month
- your local weather conditions*
- missed calls count*
- unread SMS count*
- Gmail, WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter, G+ and Skype alerts+

- low battery sign
- connection status to phone
- multiple languages

(*) Available w/ Android app
(+) Android 4.3 & up

data.description:
This is an easy-to-read weather display that sticks to the basics.  You can easily read the time and temperature.  Need more info?  Just flick your wrist or tap your watch for air pressure, humidity, cloud coverage, moon phase, wind, sunrise, sunset, station, and last update time.  Whew - that's a lot.

Customize your app for weather service, Fahrenheit/Celsius, units, screen background, and more. SetPebble subscribers can also choose from commercial weather services and home PWS devices. Contact developer for ThingSpeak connections.

data.description:
This is a full weather station at your fingertips (or at least your wrist). The GPS from your smart phone finds the closest monitoring station from one of five services.  Information includes sunrise, sunset, moon phase, air pressure, humidity, cloud coverage, wind, temperature, and see forecast info with a wrist shake.

Customizable for weather service, units, language, screen, vibration, etc.

Now with Timeline pins: daily weather forecasts are pushed to your Pebble.

data.author: unrelenting.technology

changelog.release_notes:
Added automatic subject text sizing.

PREVIOUSLY: customizable colors on the colorful Pebbles, optional Timeline integration, long Unicode class names, and vibration.
Epic update for SDK 3.x! Now with customizable colors on the colorful Pebbles, optional Timeline integration, long Unicode class names, and vibration.
Fix a bug with the previous day's classes showing

data.description:
A watchface that shows time to your next class (or time to the end of your current class). Must have for students.

+ Customizable colors
+ Backup and restore your schedule to/from any notes app / text editor / whatever
+ Vibration before a class begins/ends (set the time in settings)
+ You can import your schedule from My Class Schedule for Android
+ Long Unicode class names are supported
+ Optional Pebble Timeline integration (you have to run Classy Clock to get timeline pins for today's classes, it doesn't store your schedule on a server)

latest_release.release_notes:
Added automatic subject text sizing.

PREVIOUSLY: customizable colors on the colorful Pebbles, optional Timeline integration, long Unicode class names, and vibration.

data.author: Joshua Wise
data.description:
Dali Clock displays a digital clock; when a digit changes, it "melts" into its new shape.  Bring a dose of surrealism to your wrist with this port of jwz's famous xdaliclock.

(Animation looks much better than the screenshots!)
data.title: Dali Clock

data.author: Benjamin Gritl

changelog.release_notes: new feature: vibes losing bt connection

data.description:
demo: 83z.de/minus
screenshot shows 2:30

invert: shake within 5 seconds after start
vertical bar: hours
horizontal bar: minutes

big dots bottom to top: 15 30 45 minutes
hour bar above big dots: 3 6 9 hours
hour bar beneath big dots: 2 5 8 h
hour bar between big dots: 1 4 7 10 h
hour bar bottom: 12 h
hour bar top: 11 h

no horizontal bar: 0 minutes

vibes losing bt connection

latest_release.release_notes: shake to invert

changelog.release_notes: shake within 5 seconds after start for bigger minutes

new:
battery indicator
bt connection indicator
shake to show day of month
new feature: vibes losing bt connection

data.description:
minutes on current hour position off analogue watch
shake within 5 sec after start for bigger min
shake to show day of month

1st screenshot shows 3:47 (battery >= 30%, connected)
2nd shows 4:18 (battery >= 30%, connected)
3nd shows 4:19, 6th (after shake) (battery >= 30%, connected)
4th shows 4:46 (battery less than 30 %, 14th (after shake) no bt connection )

vibes losing bt connection

latest_release.release_notes: shake within 5 seconds after start for bigger minutes

data.title: on hour

data.author: Booski

changelog.release_notes: Changed the logic so the time is never underestimated
Fixed a bug where the watch would constantly think it's before noon
Reverted background coloring on account of it being ugly. This also enabled support for monochrome pebbles.
Added variable background color depending on time of day

Changed the time format to the less lateness-inducing behaviour of being zero to five minutes ahead instead of two minutes late to two minutes early.
(So the watch will show the time to be five minutes past twelve between 12:00 and 12:05 instead of between 11:57 and 11:02)

Also fixed the first of each month to be presented as a word instead of a number.

data.description: A watchface showing fuzzy time, such as "Ten to two." in complete sentences. It also shows the date in a similar manner. The time displayed is always approximate - the actual time is rounded up to the closest full five minute mark. This version shows time and date in swedish.

latest_release.release_notes: Changed the logic so the time is never underestimated

data.title: Fuzzy watchface, swedish

data.author: Paul McMonagle

changelog.release_notes: New: Tapping your Pebble watch will display the title of the show currently playing on TVO broadcast!

data.description: A very basic watchface accompanied by the TVO logo. Tapping your watch will display the show currently playing on TVO broadcast.

latest_release.release_notes: New: Tapping your Pebble watch will display the title of the show currently playing on TVO broadcast!

data.author: J&M Soft

changelog.release_notes: Add option for Always show latest heart beat rate.
Change Pebble 2 version, shake to show heart rate

Add the following options
+ Vibrate Bluetooth Connect
+ Vibrate Hourly
+ Date Box Colour & Week Day Text Colour

Add Setting Screen to change Watch face display,
1. Turn on/off Seconds Hand    ** show seconds hand will cause battery drain.
2. Turn on/off Bluetooth connected icon.
3. Turn on/off Battery status icon.
4. Hours hand colour.          ** colour only apply to colour devices.
5. Minutes hand colour.
6. Seconds hand colour.
7. Hours marks colour.

Add App Setting screen to change display on watch face.
** show seconds hand will cause battery drain.

Change minute hand colour, make it easy to read.
fixed Monday weekday disappeared.

Changes, shake watch to enable live compass for 30 seconds.

try to deduce battery usages.
Shake Watch to toggle compass on/off
Fixed Battery drain, and shake watch to show/hide seconds hand

Weather update bugs fixed.
Compass display bugs fixed.

Add Pebble Time & Pebble Round Support.
Add Compass display.

data.description:
Unique watch face turns your Pebble into a live compass.

What's more?

- Weather information from Hong Kong Observatory.  Date is compressed for efficiency.

latest_release.release_notes: Add option for Always show latest heart beat rate.

data.title: HKWX

data.author: Patrick Balestra
data.description:
Super Watchface brings everything in one watch face with a simple and clean design.
- 4 different themes
- Time (12h and 24h)
- 6 different date formats and 8 languages
- Current weather and temperature
- Battery percentage and charging status
- Bluetooth connection status (and vibration)
- Many settings in official Pebble app

latest_release.release_notes: Bug fixes

data.title: Super Watchface

data.author: reno
data.description:
Big time and date, rendered in the timeless Univers typeface. 

Special thanks to Big Time and ice2097's Pix2 watchface. 

Enjoy!
data.title: Big Univers

data.author: Seth Leonard
data.description: A watch that aids you in staying mindful throughout your day. Randomly once every other hour, the watch displays a message chosen randomly from one of ten that you input via your phone. Also, add a permanent message that appears below the time. Use for daily affirmations, spiritual reminders, etc. Support optional date display.

latest_release.release_notes: Updated javascript URL to AWS.

data.title: Mindfulness

data.description: Since a year Pallex (formerly MetrixPebble) is in the Top 10 of MyPebbleFaces concept charts. Now we realized it, and it looks amazing. It uses your current location to show the weather and visualizes your battery state, if you want it.

data.description:
Triple Time is a brand new WatchFace that displays the time in a simple, clear, and easy way.

Triple Time Shows;
- Time in 12hr mode
- Day of the week
- Date (month/day/year)

data.description:
The Japanese (Romanji) version of the Pebble Text Watch project. This version shows hours (ji) and minutes (fun) in romanji text, just as you would speak it in Japanese. 

\(^u^ )/  emoji says, "This is a particularly useful watchface if you are learning Japanese!"

latest_release.release_notes: Updated to work with Pebble 2.0 SDK, firmware and mobile apps

data.title: Japanese Text Watch (Romanji)

data.author: hencam

changelog.release_notes:
third bug-fix release.
Fix for 0 hour at midnight.

data.description:
This is roughly based on my old Diesel DZ7044 digital watch, which is a great watch apart from the strap which only seems to last 6 months or so before I have to send it off for replacement.

So, here's a Pebble version instead!

It's a nice easy to read watch face, with am/pm and day/date/weekday displayed but it still manages to look unique and use all the available screen.

latest_release.release_notes:
third bug-fix release.
Fix for 0 hour at midnight.

data.title: D 2.0

data.author: FawzmaGames

changelog.release_notes:
Fixed the battery indicator
Added Bluetooth connection status.

Both are now positioned right above the date instead of in top corner.

data.description:
This is a rotating minutes dial with a tick at the top pointing out the current minutes with the hour in the center.

Current date is in FDA format for those in certain industries that could use the format reminder.

Includes battery and bluetooth indicator. Battery indicator turned on when the battery gets below 20%.

Bluetooth fires off 2 short vibrations when disconnected.

latest_release.release_notes:
Fixed the battery indicator
Added Bluetooth connection status.

Both are now positioned right above the date instead of in top corner.

data.title: In and Out

data.description:
Wear Bill Murray on your wrist..what else is there to say!!
 "Get her!" That was your whole plan, huh, "get her." Very scientific.

data.title: Billy Murray Watch Face

data.author: chrobe

changelog.release_notes: Indent of date to align it better.

data.description:
Swedish modification of Simple F by Foxel.

To change background tap or shake a watch in first 2 seconds after watchface start (e.g. go to pebble menu, press back and shake)

Features:
* Weeknumber
* battery indicator
* bluetooth indicator (only shows if connection is broken)
* connection break indicator and vibe
* battery low vibration (20% and 10%)

latest_release.release_notes: Indent of date to align it better.

data.title: SweWeek

data.author: Monky Games

changelog.release_notes: Dynamic Notifications! Read the release notes here: https://confluence.monky-games.com/display/IFP/Watchface+Version+3.2+Stable+Release+Notes

Name change to Instant for Pebble!
Read the release notes here: https://sites.google.com/site/mypebbleinstant/release-notes/watchface/v25
Detailed release notes can be found here: https://sites.google.com/site/mypebbleinstant/release-notes/stable/watchfacev23

Summary
Production Release

* Fixed a bug with watch battery not being updated
* Reordered ringer mode and internet connectivity icons

data.description:
Instant for Pebble allows you to get your cell phone status right onto your Pebble Smartwatch. Popular social media apps, sms, and missed calls are supported.

Additional information such as Bluetooth connection, Internet Connectivity, Local Temperature, Phone and Watch Battery can be displayed on the watchface.

All notifications are dynamic. Meaning, there is now no limit to the applications that you can be used with this watchface!

latest_release.release_notes: https://confluence.monky-games.com/display/IFP/Watchface+Version+3.5+Stable+Release+Notes

data.title: Instant for Pebble

data.author: GarciSoft
data.description:
Simple clock that displays time / battery / date. 

Small numbers showing time, and large numbers formed by circles show the minutes. 

The white circles show the battery every 20%. 

Vibration losing the bluetooth connection.
data.title: Bubble Time

data.author: Grant64

changelog.release_notes: First release to the App Store.

data.description:
A simple watch face featuring the classic Triumph TR4.

Clock shows seconds, updated every 5 seconds, date and battery percentage.

latest_release.release_notes: First release to the App Store.

data.title: TR4 Watchface

data.author: nuthinking
data.description:
Glance divides the day equally in 3 parts (work, play and rest) and allows to quickly grasp in which stage of the day you are.

Do you need sometimes more precise information? Just shake your wrist!

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed stop updating issue.

data.title: Glance

data.author: Nazaret Vaz
data.description:
TextWatch Face with Proximity. If your phone is out of Bluetooth range, it displays a message+vibrates+turns the backlight on.
This is based on PebbleTextWatch by wearewip.
data.title: TextWatchBT

data.author: João Luís

changelog.release_notes: Version 1.1.2 - Bug fixed: Date was not showing (only in March)

data.description:
A simple watchface I designed, mainly because I wanted one in Portuguese. It shows the time, the date, the weekday, the connection status and the battery status.

It is named after the Portuguese national anthem, A Portuguesa (The Portuguese).

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.1.2 - Bug fixed: Date was not showing (only in March)

data.title: A Portuguesa
